author: USA TODAY, Doyle Rice, USA TODAY
title: Air pollution has dropped by 30% in the Northeast, NASA says. Are coronavirus stay-at-home orders responsible?
description: Cities such as Washington, Philadelphia and New York are seeing significant improvement in air quality as people stay home because of the coronavirus.
content:
• Cities such from Washington, D.C., to Boston have seen significant improvement in air quality.
  • March 2020 showed the lowest monthly atmospheric nitrogen dioxide levels of any March on record.
  • However, in the U.S., "these recent improve… [+2924 chars]
